newsletters.title: February Fun & Updates
newsletters.snippet: Valentine's picnic info and new playground rules.
newsletters.content:
Dear Parents,

We are excited to announce our annual Valentine's Picnic taking place on Friday, 14th February. Please pack a special lunch for your little ones. We will provide treats and juice!

Additionally, please note the new playground rules regarding the jungle gym to ensure safety during wet weather.

Regards,
School Management
newsletters.author: Principal Skinner

newsletters.title: Term 1 Curriculum
newsletters.snippet: What we are learning this term in Grade R and 1.
newsletters.content:
Welcome to Term 1! This term we are focusing on:

- Mathematics: Counting to 20, basic shapes, and patterns.
- Language: Phonics (S, A, T, P, I, N), storytelling, and basic writing skills.
- Life Skills: Hygiene, social interaction, and creative arts.

Please check your child's diary daily for homework updates.
newsletters.author: Mrs. Krabappel

newsletters.title: Welcome Back 2026
newsletters.content:
Welcome back to a brand new year at Klim & Klouter! We hope you had a restful holiday.

We are thrilled to introduce two new staff members: Mr. Keating (Grade 1) and Ms. Honey (Grade R).

Key Dates:
- 14 Feb: Valentine's Picnic
- 20 Feb: Parent Teacher Meeting
- 05 Mar: School Concert

Here's to a fantastic year ahead!
newsletters.author: Principal Skinner

newsletters.title: Year End Wrap Up
newsletters.snippet: Photos from the concert and holiday wishes.
newsletters.content:
What a year it has been! Our annual concert was a massive success. Thank you to all parents who attended and helped with costumes.

Report cards are now available for collection at the front office.

We wish you a safe and happy holiday season. See you in 2026!
